title: For sale: Sweet Caporal pin Devlin PSA 5

posts.post_title: For sale: Sweet Caporal pin Devlin PSA 5
posts.post_content:
I guess this guy goes here. A nice PSA 5 graded Sweet Caporal pin of Art Devlin. Sorry to see this go, but its what it is. NICE PIECE

18.00 shipped. Ck/MO preferred. PM to reserve, THANKS SCOTT
bump for small, one time, price drop:)
18.00 shipped till Wed, then its gone forever.:)
